title: ArchiveResult Schema
description: Defines structure and validation rules for ArchiveResult evidence created by Create-ArchiveManifest.ps1.

evidence_type.description: Identifies this record as an ArchiveResult evidence document.

script.description: The script or process that produced this evidence.

timestamp_utc.description: UTC timestamp when archive creation completed.

manifest_file.description: Path to the EvidenceArchiveManifest.json file included in the archive.

included_badge.description: Indicates if the docs/badges/evidence-status.svg file was included in the archive.

signed.description: True if the manifest was successfully signed with a GPG key.

total_evidence.description: Total count of evidence JSON files included in this archive.

status.description: Overall status of the archive operation.
